description: The user right-clicked on the desktop, which opened a context menu with options such as "Arrange Icons By", "Refresh", "Paste", "Paste Shortcut", "New", and "Properties".
outcome: A context menu appeared on the desktop, offering options like "Arrange Icons By", "Refresh", "Paste", "Paste Shortcut", "New", and "Properties". The mouse cursor is no longer visible.

description: The user clicked the mouse to select "Properties" from the desktop context menu.
outcome: The context menu closed and the "Display Properties" window opened. The "Theme" dropdown menu displays "Windows Classic (Modified)".

description: The user clicked the "Screen Saver" dropdown menu, changing the selection from "Windows XP" to "Starfield".
outcome: The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu switched its selection from "Windows XP" to "Starfield."  Concurrently, the "Wait" text field, set to "10 minutes", and the "On resume, password protect" checkbox were removed.

description: The user clicked on the "None" option within the open "Screen Saver" dropdown menu of the "Display Properties" window.
outcome: The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu closed. A new window, titled "Power Options Properties," opened on top of the "Display Properties" window.  The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu and the "Power..." button below it are no longer visible.

description: The user clicked the "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu and selected "Never".
outcome: The "Turn off monitor" setting in the dropdown menu changed from "After 20 mins" to "Never".

event: The mouse clicked on After 5 hours.
description: The user clicked on "After 5 hours" in the "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu.
outcome: The "Turn off monitor" setting within the "Settings for Home/Office Desk power scheme" section changed from "Never" to "After 5 hours".

description: The user clicked the "OK" button at the bottom of the "Power Options Properties" window.
outcome: The "Power Options Properties" window closed. The "Display Properties" window is visible again.
